newsitem.title: USA: Iowa-So Minn hogs - Friday estimate 110,000 - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Iowa-So Minn hogs - Friday estimate 110,000 - USDA.

text.p: Estimates include generally about 60 percent Carcass Base Hogs. Barrows and gilts steady to .50 higher compared to midsession Thursday.
Trade moderate for moderate to good demand and light to moderate offerings.
Fridays estimate: 110000 Wk ago:100000 Yr ago: 114000
Saturdays estimate: 30000 Wk ago: 21000 Yr ago: 79000
US 1-3 46-49% Carcass Base Lean Country Plants

Compared to last week: Barrows and Gilts .50 higher. Sows steady to 4.00 higher. Receipts this week 585,000 last week 542,000, last year 515,000. Barrows and Gilts average weight for week ending Nov. 16 255.0 lbs compared to 254.6 lbs previous week 252.4 lbs last year.
